fields.name: Revenge of the Mole Man
fields.description: An entire village has gone missing in Marewood Forest! This could only be the doing of your old nemesis, the Mole Man. Journey into the forest to see if you can find the Mole Man's lair once again.
fields.intro_text:
As you were talking to some adventurers at the Main Hall, you learned about a mysterious disappearance.  This was not your typical everyday disappearance, but a disappearance on a grand scale. An entire village had disappeared! No, not just the people in the village, but the village itself!

The village of Slobourough is completely gone. Where the village once stood there is a gaping hole in the ground. You suspect only the villainous Mole Man could have perpetrated such a thing! You do not know how to find the villain, so you go about it the only way you can.

You set off for the Marewood Forest to find the same quicksand that you found by accident once before.

Well, you've succeeded in locating the same spot as before and you were dragged down into the bog! Good luck.

fields.name: You are at the bottom of a deep pit. (S)
fields.description: You are at the bottom of the deepest pit you have ever seen. You cannot see the top of the pit. There is a tunnel to the south.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel.
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable north/south tunnel.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are at a north/south/east T-intersection. It is too dark to see anything of what may be in either direction.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: There is a chamber to the north and another to the south.

fields.name: You are in a small cave. (S)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable small cave. The only exit is to the south.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: There are chambers to the north and south.

fields.name: You are in a cave. (S)
fields.description: There are some old bones and the remains of a campfire here. The only exit is to the south.

fields.name: You are in a cave. (N)
fields.description: You are in a cave with the only exit to the north. There are some interesting marks on the wall here.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel.
fields.description: There is a bend in the tunnel to the east.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the tunnel. (S/W)
fields.description: The tunnel bends from the west to the south. There is a chamber to the south.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are at a T-intersection in the tunnel. You may go north, south or east.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel.
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable east/west tunnel. To the east you can see some doors.

fields.name: You are at the east end of a tunnel. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at the unremarkable east end of a tunnel. To the north, south and east are doors.

fields.name: You are in a small north chamber. (S)
fields.description: The only exit you can see is to the south.

fields.name: You are in an east chamber. (W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable east chamber. The exit is to the west.

fields.name: You are in a south chamber. (N)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable south chamber.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable north/south tunnel. There is a chamber to the west.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are in a north/south tunnel. There is another tunnel going east.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable east/west tunnel. There is a chamber to the north.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the tunnel. (S/W)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable bend in the tunnel. The tunnel goes west and south from here.

fields.name: You are in a small storage room. (W)
fields.description: There are old cruddy brooms and mops and other things of equally little value here. The only exit is to the west.

fields.name: You are in a small east chamber. (W)
fields.description: You are in a small chamber with an exit to the west. The air is somewhat stale in here.

fields.name: You are in a small west chamber. (E)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable small west chamber. The exit is to the east.

fields.name: You are in a cougar's den. (S)
fields.description: You are in a small chamber that is now being used for a den by a cougar and its cubs.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/W)
fields.description: There is a chamber to the north and another to the west.

fields.name: You are at a four-way intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable four-way intersection. The tunnels go in all directions.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel.
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable east/west tunnel. To the west you see a four-way intersection.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel.
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable east/west tunnel.

fields.name: You are in a south chamber. (N)
fields.description: You are in a southern chamber. The only exit is to the north.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the tunnel. (N/W)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable bend in the tunnel. The tunnel goes from west to north.

fields.name: You are in a large north chamber. (S)
fields.description: The ceiling is very high here. The only exit is to the south.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are in a secret north/south tunnel. There is a chamber to the east.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (N/S/W)
fields.description: The north/south tunnel intersects a west-bound one here.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable east/west tunnel with a chamber to the north.

fields.name: You are in a small chamber. (S)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable small chamber with a door to the south.

fields.name: You are in a small chamber. (N)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable small chamber with a door to the north.

fields.name: You are in a small west chamber. (E)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable small chamber. The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: You are in a small west chamber. (E)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable small chamber. The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel.
fields.description: To the east you see a four-way intersection. To the west you see a T-intersection.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the tunnel. (N/E)
fields.description: The tunnel goes east and north from here.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable north/south tunnel. There is a chamber to the west and another to the east.

fields.name: You are in a small east chamber. (W)
fields.description: You are in a small unremarkable chamber. The only exit is to the west.

fields.name: You are in a west chamber. (E)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable west chamber. The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the tunnel. (S/W)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable bend in the tunnel. There is a chamber to the west and the tunnel goes south.

fields.name: You are in a large cavern. (E)
fields.description: You are in a rather large cavern. There are stalactites and stalagmites covering the room. The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel.
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable north/south tunnel.

fields.name: You are at a four-way intersection. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: To the east you can see some doors. To the west is only darkness.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel. (S/E/W)
fields.description: There is a chamber to the east and another to the south.

fields.name: You are in a small south chamber. (N)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable south chamber. There is an exit to the north.

fields.name: You are in a small east chamber. (W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable east chamber. The only exit is to the west.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable north/south tunnel. There are chambers both east and west.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel.
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable north/south tunnel.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable north/south tunnel. There are chambers east and west.

fields.name: You are in a small south chamber. (N)
fields.description: The walls are very rough here, with strange textures. The south wall has a square rock on it

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel. (N/E/W)
fields.description: To the east you see a four-way intersection. There is a chamber to the north.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel.
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable east/west tunnel. To the west you see a bend in the tunnel.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable T-intersection. You may go north, east or south.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable north/south tunnel. To the east and north are large chambers.

fields.name: You are in a cavern. (S)
fields.description: There are some old bones and the remains of a campfire here. The only exit is to the south.

fields.name: You are in a large cavern. (W)
fields.description: There are old dead rats and other small animal carcass remains in here.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel.
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable north/south tunnel. There is a chamber to the south.

fields.name: You are in a cavern. (N)
fields.description: You are in a large cavern covered by old mineral deposits. The only exit is to the north.

fields.name: You are in a south chamber. (N)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable south chamber. The only exit is to the north.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the tunnel. (S/E)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable bend in the tunnel. The tunnel bends from south to east. To the south is a chamber.

fields.name: You are in a north chamber. (S)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable north chamber. The only exit is to the south.

fields.name: You are in a west chamber. (E)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable west chamber. To the east there is a door.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable T-intersection. Tunnels go north, east and west.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel.
fields.description: There are T-intersections to both the east and west.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (N/S/W)
fields.description: You may go west, north or south. To the north and south are large chambers.

fields.name: You are in a large comfortable chamber. (S)
fields.description: You are in a large very plush looking chamber. There are satin and silk drapes and other very luxurious surroundings. The only exit is to the south.

fields.name: You are in a large comfortable chamber. (N)
fields.description: You are in a large very plush looking chamber. There are satin and silk drapes and other very luxurious surroundings. You notice a large curtain on the east wall.

fields.name: You are in a secret passage. (E/W)
fields.description: You are in a secret passage going east and west. There is a chamber to the east that is emitting strange lights.

fields.name: You are in a secret laboratory. (W)
fields.description: You are in a secret laboratory. There are very strange devices scattered all over the room. The only exit is to the west.

fields.name: You are in the elevator room. (N)
fields.description: You are in a massive room with no roof. The village that disappeared came here. It must be directly below where the village was on the surface.

fields.name: You are in a small east chamber. (W)
fields.description: You are in a small chamber with an exit to the west. The air is somewhat stale in here.

fields.name: You are in a small west chamber. (E)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable west chamber. The exit is to the east.

fields.name: magic staff
fields.description: You see the magical staff of the Mole Man. It seems to shimmer as if it were alive!

fields.name: iron gate
fields.description: You see a heavy iron gate blocking the passage into the chamber to the south.

fields.name: brass key
fields.description: You see a small brass key.

fields.name: timer
fields.description: You see a strange device with a dial knob, a red button, and calibrations from 0-90 on it. A label says, "Remote Control Timer".

fields.name: lab notes
fields.description: You see the lab notes of Professor Worth.

fields.name: bloody axe
fields.description: You see a crude bloody axe here.

fields.name: Eddie's axe
fields.description: You see the axe Eddie was carrying.

fields.name: Neddie's axe
fields.description: You see the axe Neddie was carrying.

fields.name: Freddie's axe
fields.description: You see the axe Freddie was carrying.

fields.name: General's sword
fields.description: You see a sword that was being used by the General.

fields.name: console
fields.description: You see a control console of some sort. It has been deactivated (you can tell because there is a blinking light on the front that says, "Deactivated").

fields.name: south door
fields.description: As you look around, you find a door that was hidden in the shadows.

fields.name: Sir Galliant's body
fields.description: You see the noble knight, Sir Galliant, die fighting. The world will miss him.

fields.name: shattered robot
fields.description: As the Mole Man falls, his body breaks up and you realize it was really just a robot.

fields.name: Cleaver
fields.description: You see a beautiful extremely well made axe with the name "Cleaver" engraved on it.

fields.name: Hewer
fields.description: You see a beautiful and very well made axe with the name "Hewer" engraved on it.

fields.name: village
fields.description: You see the village that was stolen from the surface. It is sitting in the middle of this gigantic room. It appears to be sitting on some sort of a gigantic elevator platform.

fields.name: rapier
fields.description: You see a high quality rapier, the weapon Alex was using.

fields.name: sword19
fields.description: You see a standard sword with a "19" stamped on it.

fields.name: Stinger
fields.description: You see a beautiful well balanced sword with the name "Stinger" engraved on it.

fields.name: iron key
fields.description: You see a large iron key.

fields.name: gold nuggets
fields.description: You see a huge pile of gold nuggets.

fields.name: club
fields.description: You see a large wooden club.

fields.name: bottle
fields.description: You see a brown bottle.

fields.name: pearls
fields.description: You see a string of pearls.

fields.name: nobody dead
fields.description: You see nobody's body.

fields.name: dead villagers
fields.description: You see the scattered remains of every last villager! With rescuers like you we don't need the abductors!

fields.name: dead slaves everywhere
fields.description: You see the dead bodies of a thousand mindless slaves.

fields.name: gelatinous mound
fields.description: You see a mound of gelatinous substance that was once alive.

fields.name: wheels and gears
fields.description: You see wheels, gears and pulleys. The remains of droid1.

fields.name: wheels and gears
fields.description: You see wheels, gears and pulleys. The remains of droid2.

fields.name: a secret passage east
fields.description: You found a secret passage to the east behind the curtain!

fields.name: dead Basilisk
fields.description: You see the dead body of the basilisk. You have heard Hokas Tokas talk about purchasing one to use for parts for magical potions and such.

fields.text: The village has been elevated to the surface and you are home again!
Timer instructions: 1. Set timer to nn (where nn = time required to get to the elevator room.) 2. Press red button. 3. Go directly to elevator room. 4. Wait for elevator to activate.
(Use the command USE TIMER to do all this.)

You hear a loud buzzing as the timer goes off. A few seconds later you hear nothing as you are crushed by tons of dirt and rubble. (Next time try to make it to the proper room before you set the timer!)

fields.name: Mole Man
fields.description: You see a very ugly man that looks familiar. Ah, yes it's the Mole Man. He has acquired a new weapon; it is some kind of a magic staff.

fields.name: Nobody
fields.description: You see nobody here.

fields.name: Villager
fields.description: You see the villagers standing around and looking bewildered. They are looking to you for assistance in getting their village placed back in its rightful spot on the surface.

fields.name: Mindless Creature
fields.description: You see a mindless horde of subterranean creatures that blindly follow the lead of the Mole Man. There are nearly 1,000 of them.

fields.name: Rock Creature
fields.description: You see a large creature made up almost entirely of rocks and minerals. He does not look friendly!

fields.name: Troglodyte
fields.description: You see a large troglodyte pulling out a bloody axe and starting toward you with a sneer on his face.

fields.name: Eddie
fields.description: You see a rather large dwarf sitting on a rock and eating a piece of pheasant. As you enter he stands and says, "Neddie, Freddie - look alive! We've got company!"

fields.name: Neddie
fields.description: You see another large dwarf sitting on another rock eating a piece of roast chicken. He stands up to greet you.

fields.name: Freddie
fields.description: You see a small dwarf sitting on a large duffel bag eating Jello. He also stands up and says, "Hi."

fields.name: General Lard
fields.description: You see a man in some kind of uniform with lots of medals and stars on it. He must be a General. He has a name plate on his uniform that says "Lard". You notice a small brass key hanging on his belt.

fields.name: Gelatinous Cube
fields.description: You see a large gelatinous cube. The creature was sitting in the middle of the room and devouring a corpse, but you almost didn't see it.

fields.name: Troll
fields.description: You see a nasty looking troll carrying a large wooden club.

fields.name: Basilisk
fields.description: You see a large lizard type creature with eight legs; a basilisk! If you are not careful, it could turn you to stone.

fields.name: Juggernaut
fields.description: You see a mammoth man in strange brown armour and a three-sided sword. He looks like he is invincible. Or if not, very hard to defeat.

fields.name: Professor Worth
fields.description: You see a man in a lab coat with a name "Worth" on it. He is some kind of a lab technician or scientist and he's working on something for the Mole Man.

fields.name: Gorilla
fields.description: You see a large black jungle gorilla. He must have climbed down here looking for food.

fields.name: Guard
fields.description: You see a man in some kind of uniform. He has a patch on his shirt that says "Guard".

fields.name: Guard
fields.description: You see a man in some kind of uniform. He has a patch on his shirt that says "Guard".

fields.name: Guard
fields.description: You see a man in some kind of uniform. He has a patch on his shirt that says "Guard".

fields.name: Necrotron
fields.description: You see what you thought at first to be a giant crab, but its body is made of metal! It has a metal plate on it that reads, "Necrotron (patent pending)".

fields.name: Imperial Guard
fields.description: You see a man in the unmistakable armour of an Imperial Guard. He readies his axe to cleave thee in twain.

fields.name: Imperial Guard
fields.description: You see a man in the unmistakable armour of an Imperial Guard. He readies his axe to slice you to shreds.

fields.name: Mindless Slave
fields.description: You see one of the Mole Man's mindless slaves. They usually travel in groups, but this one is alone.

fields.name: Giant Mole
fields.description: You a gigantic mole. He is almost as big as a bull!

fields.name: Droid1
fields.description: As you entered the room a bright chrome mechanical man pivoted and started toward you. The robot has a plate on the front that says "1".

fields.name: Droid2
fields.description: There is a mechanical man here. He is a brightly polished and well built robot. He has a plate on the front of him that says "2".

fields.name: Alex
fields.description: A powerful-looking young man in the best chain armour you have ever seen greets you. He says he is a Free Adventurer and came down here to find the village and help restore it if possible.

fields.name: Sergeant
fields.description: You see a guard with the stripes of a Sergeant. He readies his axe.

fields.name: Captain
fields.description: There is a man in a Captain's uniform here with a nasty scowl on his face. You notice a iron key hanging from his belt.

fields.name: Sir Galliant
fields.description: You see a knight in shining armour. He says he is Sir Galliant and he has come to free the village of Slobourogh.

fields.name: Giant Bat
fields.description: As you enter the room a giant bat swoops down at you screeching.

fields.name: Giant Lizard
fields.description: You see a giant lizard with long powerful legs and a vicious look about him. He appears to be much faster than most lizards you have encountered.

fields.name: Mole Man
fields.description: You see a very ugly man that looks familiar. Ah, yes it's the Mole Man! As he comes toward you, you hear a faint hum -- like a motor running.

fields.question: How do I defeat the mindless army?
How do I defeat the Juggernaut?
How do I raise the village?

fields.answer: Try the command DRINK BLOOD. Also try DRINK with something that doesn't exist (like DRINK JELLO).
EXAMINE WALL in the room where you FIRST encounter the mindless army...
EXAMINE CURTAIN in the room where you meet the REAL Mole Man (not the robot)...
Kill Professor Worth and GET TIMER...
Now go to the room where the village is and raise it to the surface. (SAY *R74 to jump immediately there.)
USE TIMER in the room with the village. Set it to whatever time you want and wait that many turns (SMILE or something to pass time).
